Sell or Part Exchange Your Camera

Sell your camera equipment in just 3 easy steps

Step 1: Get a quote

Simply complete the form below or pop into our showroom and talk to our friendly staff.

Step 2: Post us your camera

Having accepted the quotation, simply send your equipment to our Burgess Hill store.

Step 3: Receive your payment

Once the equipment has been received, the payment shall be sent to you.
